name: 3dMEMA
author: AFNI Developers
description: 3dMEMA is a program for performing Mixed Effects Meta Analysis at group level that models both within- and across-subjects variability.

inputs.description: Output prefix (just prefix, no view+suffix needed)
inputs.name: Output prefix

inputs.description: Number of jobs for parallel computing
inputs.name: Number of jobs

inputs.description: Set data for one of the test variables
inputs.name: Set data

inputs.description: Specify the name of a text file containing a table for the covariate(s).
inputs.name: Covariates file

inputs.description: Specify the center values for covariates.
inputs.name: Covariates center

inputs.description: Specify how covariates should be modeled.
inputs.name: Covariates model

inputs.description: Specify the name of each covariate.
inputs.name: Covariates name

inputs.description: Label of groups, used for output naming.
inputs.name: Groups

inputs.description: Use AFNI's C io functions.
inputs.name: C IO functions flag

inputs.description: Perform Hartung-Knapp adjustment for the output t-statistic.
inputs.name: H-K test flag

inputs.description: Only process voxels inside the specified mask.
inputs.name: Mask file

inputs.description: Specify how many beta/t-statistics can be zero.
inputs.name: Maximum zeros allowed

inputs.description: Specify missing data handling.
inputs.name: Missing data

inputs.description: Model outliers with a Laplace distribution.
inputs.name: Model outliers flag

inputs.description: Number of non-zero beta values required.
inputs.name: Minimum non-zero betas

inputs.description: Specify not to use Hartung-Knapp adjustment.
inputs.name: No H-K test flag

inputs.description: Specify not to model outliers.
inputs.name: No model outliers flag

inputs.description: Do not output residuals and their Z values.
inputs.name: No residual Z flag

inputs.description: Output residuals and their Z values.
inputs.name: Residual Z flag

inputs.description: Use R's io functions.
inputs.name: R IO functions flag

inputs.description: Assume same cross-subjects variability between groups.
inputs.name: Equal variance flag

inputs.description: Model cross-subject variability difference between groups.
inputs.name: Unequal variance flag

inputs.description: Specify verbosity level
inputs.name: Verbosity level

inputs.description: Output missing data debug file.
inputs.name: Debug arguments flag

inputs.description: Show help message
inputs.name: Help flag

inputs.description: Name of 1 or 2 conditions, tasks, or GLTs
inputs.name: Conditions

inputs.description: Do not compute t-statistics
inputs.name: No t-stat flag
